plot: While the world seems to be hypnotized by "Snow Dog", an adorable canine that was sent from India as a friendship mascot, three young men plan to kidnap the dog, each for their own purpose....
title: Ching ma thoed
plot_es: While the world seems to be hypnotized by "Snow Dog", an adorable canine that was sent from India as a friendship mascot, three young men plan to kidnap the dog, each for their own purpose....
